ruleBody:
Gamerules - the math battle!

Goal:
The goal of the game is to eliminate all of your opponent's players.
A math problem will appear on the screen.
The first player to answer correctly gets to take a shot at the opponent's players â€” so be quick! ðŸ˜€
The player who eliminates all of the opponent's players first wins.

Start by:
Choose your game settings and place your three players strategically on your game board.
Press start and wait for your opponent to be ready.
May the best mathematician win!
joinWelcome: Choose character and place your players!
placePlayerInstruction: Click on the squares to place your three players!
notReadyPopup: You need to fill in your name and place all your players to move on!
pageDescription: Create a game ID and choose your game settings
createGameRequirement: Fill in all fields to create game
createGameButtonNotReady: Waiting for all fields to be filled in
makeAMove: You answered correctly! Choose a square to shoot at. Then press OK to confirm your shot.
waitForOpponent: Waiting for opponent to make their move...
observePrompt: Game already in progress, would you like to observe?
difficultyInfo:
Level easy: numbers 1-10
Level medium: numbers 1-20
Level hard: numbers 1-50
Level nightmare: numbers 1-100
